channel.title: LCD Monitor 'lines'
channel.description: I'm getting a continuous steam of subtle lines down my screen, not really noticeable when gaming but it's progressively getting worse. High contrast areas such as a white rectangle on a gray background [Forum post box], has a what looks to be after image on the right side, as if everything gets shifted to the right. So right now I have 8 lines on the side now going from light to dark to light because I'm typing this text. Is it my screen dying or the card? If it's the monitor no biggy I have a back up, but it it's the card, I'm buying my rig sooner then I thought....

item.title: LCD Monitor 'lines'
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
Maybe this should be added to the FAQ. If you have any problems whatsoever with your monitor, make sure it’s plugged in…

Read full topic

item.title: LCD Monitor 'lines'
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

Didn’t we just have a thread about this? Except with a pink display?

Now that you mention it yeah, but I had lines and that thread is buried on page 2 or 3 I think.

Read full topic

Didn’t we just have a thread about this? Except with a pink display?

item.title: LCD Monitor 'lines'
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
^ You sir are a winner! [I’m now upset with myself I never thought of that when it’s usually the number one reason for a faulty display output.]

Read full topic

item.title: LCD Monitor 'lines'
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
My monitor did that for a while (lines going down the screen). Turns out it was my laptops external VGA connector that was just shitty. Try making sure it’s pushed an screwed in all the way.

Read full topic

item.title: LCD Monitor 'lines'
item.dc:creator: Victus
item.description:
SinfulEnd:

My friend had a similar problem, turned out to be the monitor. It started out a few lines, got progressively worse until it died. You said you had a back up, I would try swapping them out and see if it corrects the problem, then you’ll know for sure.

I’ll get right on that when a friend gives it back. :’(

Read full topic
